alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 6:52PM CST until February 19 at 10:12PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding begins along County Road 146 Champion Springs Road... the road leading to the gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 12.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Black River Annapolis 8.0 4.1 Wed 6 pm 10.4 7.7 6.1 5.3 4.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The NationalWeather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
